conclusion: Analyze forces and induced EMF due to magnetic field.
Conductor PQ slides on vertical smooth rail in uniform magnetic field.
Identify gravitational force acting downward as F_g = mg.
Identify magnetic force acting upward as F_B = BIL.
Condition for equilibrium: magnetic force must balance gravitational force.
Determine current I as I = E / (R + r).
Substitute current into force equation: B(E / (R + r))L = mg.
Solve for magnetic field strength B: B = mg(R + r) / (EL).
